  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static void
    endCurrentInstance(ExitReport exitReport)
    Exits the current instance of execution.

    Closes the engineCore by calling EngineCore.close(), then waits for the engineThread to finish execution with Thread.interrupt() and Thread.join(), before finally closing the engineWatchdog with EngineWatchdog.close().
    static void
    exit(ExitReport exitReport)
    Exits the entire JVM instance and the program execution completely.

    Calls endCurrentInstance(ExitReport) and then System.exit(int).
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The main entry point of the entire engine system and other components.

    Note: This main() method is also called when relaunching the program by relaunch(ExitReport).
    private static LaunchConfig
    parseLaunchConfig(String[] args)
    Constructs a LaunchConfig object from the String[] provided.
    static void
    relaunch(ExitReport exitReport)
    Relaunches the program.

    Ends the current instance of execution with endCurrentInstance(ExitReport), before calling the main(String[]) method, passing in the original String[] args first supplied at initial execution.

      Runs on the watchdogThread separate from the main engineCore.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point of the entire engine system and other components.

      Note: This main() method is also called when relaunching the program by relaunch(ExitReport).
      Parameters:
      args - The runtime arguments passed into the program by the JVM when the program initially starts.

    • parseLaunchConfig

      private static LaunchConfig parseLaunchConfig(String[] args) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a LaunchConfig object from the String[] provided.
      Parameters:
      args - A String[], where each element corresponds to configuration settings, which should be passed in as follows:

      0. Log level: must be a valid name of LogLevel (defaults to LogLevel.INFO if left unspecified)
      1. Debug mode: must be a valid name of DebugMode (defaults to DebugMode.OFF if left unspecified)
      2. Fatal exception handling: must be a valid name of FatalExceptionHandling (defaults to FatalExceptionHandling.CRASH if left unspecified)
      [this is intended for testing exception handling only and should be removed before release!]

      Arguments may be left unspecified to use default configuration, as long as all following arguments are also left unspecified.
      Returns:
      LaunchConfig containing the configurations parsed from the String[].
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if arguments do not conform to the above specification. Warns: If args.length() is greater than 3.

    • relaunch

      public static void relaunch(ExitReport exitReport)
      Relaunches the program.

      Ends the current instance of execution with endCurrentInstance(ExitReport), before calling the main(String[]) method, passing in the original String[] args first supplied at initial execution.
      Parameters:
      exitReport - The ExitReport containing the exit details of the current instance of execution.

    • exit

      public static void exit(ExitReport exitReport)
      Exits the entire JVM instance and the program execution completely.

      Calls endCurrentInstance(ExitReport) and then System.exit(int).
      Parameters:
      exitReport - The ExitReport containing the exit details of the current instance of execution.

    • endCurrentInstance

      private static void endCurrentInstance(ExitReport exitReport)
      Exits the current instance of execution.

      Closes the engineCore by calling EngineCore.close(), then waits for the engineThread to finish execution with Thread.interrupt() and Thread.join(), before finally closing the engineWatchdog with EngineWatchdog.close().
      Parameters:
      exitReport -

      private static void unsafeExit(int exitCode, String reason)
